charges.charge_disposition: BOP-41 mos. ct. 2-60 mos. ct. 3 (Concurrently w/each other)-Sup. Rel.-60 mos. Cts. 2 &; 3 (Conc.) No fine-spec. conds. of usp. rel.-spec. assessment $200.00-Remanded to custody of USM (2)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP-41 mos. ct. 2-60 mos. ct. 3 (Concurrently w/each other)-Sup. Rel.-60 mos. Cts. 2 &; 3 (Conc.) No fine-spec. conds. of usp. rel.-spec. assessment $200.00-Remanded to custody of USM (3)
Dismissed upon motion of the Govt (1)

charges.charge_description: Knowingly and unlawfully, by force, violence and intimidation, take from employees of the Branch Banking and Trust Company (BB&;T), 6313 Raeford Road, Fayetteville, North Carolina, to wit: $16,905.92 in United States currency, belonging to and in the care, control and possession of BB&;T. BB&;T is insured under Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) certificate number 9846-9 dated May 27, 1995 in violation of Title 18, USC, Section 2113(a)(d) Bank Robbery [5:98-m-568]

charges.charge_disposition: BOP-Ct. 2: 60 mos and Ct. 3: 60 mos consec w/Ct. 2; Sup Rel-Ct. 2: 5 yrs and Ct. 3: 3 yrs concurrently w/each other; Restitution-$16,378 jointly and severally liable w/co-def due immediately no interest; Spec Assess $200; Remanded to Custody (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)&;2-Use of a Firearm during Armed Bank Robbery; Aiding and Abetting; 18:924(c)(l) &; 2 (3)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP-Ct. 2: 60 mos and Ct. 3: 60 mos consec w/Ct. 2; Sup Rel-Ct. 2: 5 yrs and Ct. 3: 3 yrs concurrently w/each other; Restitution-$16,378 jointly and severally liable w/co-def due immediately no interest; Spec Assess $200; Remanded to Custody (3)
Dismissed upon oral motion of the Govt (1)
